migrations.description: Set --parallel=1 for existing repos to preserve the existing behavior
migrations.name: set-parallel-default

migrations.description: @nrwl/workspace:tsc is now @nrwl/js:tsc
migrations.name: 13-3-0-tsc-location

migrations.description: Remove old options that are no longer used
migrations.name: 13-6-0-remove-old-task-runner-options

migrations.description: Replace @nrwl/tao with nx
migrations.name: 13-9-0-replace-tao-with-nx

migrations.description: Update the decorate-angular-cli script to require nx instead of @nrwl/cli
migrations.name: 13-10-0-update-decorate-cli

migrations.description: Update the tasks runner property to import it from the nx package instead of @nrwl/worksapce
migrations.name: 13-10-0-update-tasks-runner

migrations.description: Remove deprecated options from webpack-server and webpack-browser.
migrations.name: update-angular-config

migrations.description: Remove enableIvy and add compilationMode to library tsconfig and remove deprecated ng-packagr options.
migrations.name: update-libraries

migrations.description: Update jest config to support jest-preset-angular
migrations.name: update-angular-jest-config

migrations.description: Move some imports from @nrwl/angular/testing to jasmine-marbles
migrations.name: update-testing-imports

migrations.description: In Angular version 13, the `teardown` flag in `TestBed` will be enabled by default. This migration automatically opts out existing apps from the new teardown behavior.
migrations.name: opt-out-testbed-teardown

migrations.description: In Angular version 13, the ESM became a first class citizen. This means the webpack config generated must be modified to support modules.
migrations.name: update-mfe-config-to-module-syntax

migrations.description: Remove the default for the invalid 'style' option for the library generator if configured.
migrations.name: remove-library-generator-style-default

migrations.description: A lot of changes to how MFEs operate were discovered and merged without appropriate migrations. This should cover migrating existing MFEs to the latest, using ESM and optmized production bundles.
migrations.name: fix-incorrect-mfe-setups

migrations.description: Angular doesn't attach styles.js to index.html with type=module in dev mode, meaning an error is written to the console. Cypress falls over on this error. Add logic to Cypress e2e projects to ignore this error.
migrations.name: add-cypress-mfe-workaround

migrations.description: Karma coverage is broken since Angular 13 upgarde and the karma config is severely out of date. Bring it up to date fixing the coverage issue.
migrations.name: migrate-karma-config

migrations.description: Set buildLibsFromSource property to false to not break existing usage.
migrations.name: set-build-libs-from-source

migrations.description: Remove no longer valid Angular schematic options from `angular.json`.
migrations.name: schematic-options-13

migrations.description: Remove deprecated options from 'angular.json' that are no longer present in v13.
migrations.name: update-angular-config-v13

migrations.description: Update library projects to be published in partial mode and removed deprecated options from ng-packagr configuration.
migrations.name: update-libraries-v13

migrations.description: Remove polyfills required only for Internet Explorer which is no longer supported.
migrations.name: drop-ie-polyfills

migrations.description: Updating '.gitignore' to include '.angular/cache'.
migrations.name: update-gitignore

migrations.description: Migrates `[routerLink]=""` in templates to `[routerLink]="[]"` because these links are likely intended to route to the current page with updated fragment/query params.
migrations.name: migration-v13-router-link-empty-expression

migrations.description: In Angular version 13, the `teardown` flag in `TestBed` will be enabled by default. This migration automatically opts out existing apps from the new teardown behavior.
migrations.name: migration-v13-testbed-teardown

migrations.description: As of Angular version 13, `entryComponents` are no longer necessary.
migrations.name: migration-v13.1-entry-components

migrations.description: Updates Angular Material to v13
migrations.name: migration-v13

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v13
migrations.name: migration-v13

migrations.description: The road to v13 beta
migrations.name: ngrx-store-migration-13-beta

migrations.description: The road to v13 RC
migrations.name: ngrx-store-migration-13-rc

migrations.description: The road to v13
migrations.name: ngrx-effects-migration-03

migrations.description: Support .test. file names in tsconfigs
migrations.name: update-ts-config-for-test-filenames

migrations.description: Create a root babel config file if it doesn't exist and using babel-jest in jest.config.js and add @nrwl/web as needed
migrations.name: add-missing-root-babel-config

migrations.description: Renames @nrwl/node:build to @nrwl/node:webpack
migrations.name: rename-build-to-webpack

migrations.description: Renames @nrwl/node:execute to @nrwl/node:node
migrations.name: rename-execute-to-node

migrations.description: Renames @nrwl/node:package to @nrwl/js:tsc
migrations.name: update-package-to-tsc
